body_html:
@ZmeiGorynych You are not picking the correct msbuild.exe. It should be the one in C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin.
An alternative is to use Ninja as the generator. Please take a look here.
body_text:
@ZmeiGorynych You are not picking the correct msbuild.exe. It should be the one in C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin.
An alternative is to use Ninja as the generator. Please take a look here.
body:
@ZmeiGorynych You are not picking the correct `msbuild.exe`. It should be the one in `C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin`.
An alternative is to use `Ninja` as the generator. Please take a look [here](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/windows.html#speeding-cuda-build-for-windows).
